alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 25 at 2:32AM CDT until October 25 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN NEWTON AND SOUTHEASTERN JASPER COUNTIES... At 231 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Trout Creek to near Wrights Settlement to near Gist, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kirbyville, Call, Buna, Wrights Settlement, Gist, Devils Pocket, Trout Creek, Old Salem and Bleakwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
